sentences.en: A beginner could really enjoy the hobby for an outlay of between £100 or £120 a month.
sentences.cn: 初学者只需每月花上100到120英镑便能真正享受到这种爱好带来的乐趣。

sentences.en: As a beginner, everything is very new to him.
sentences.cn: 他刚起步, 对一切都很生疏.

sentences.en: Don't laugh. In the beginner's class, they give you a chance to rest between exercises.
sentences.cn: 别笑. 在初级课程中你有机会休息.

sentences.en: He plays well enough for a beginner.
sentences.cn: 对于初学者来说,他弹奏得相当不错.

sentences.en: He's a rank beginner of the job, but he'll learn.
sentences.cn: 他干这工作是个新手,做得很差, 但他会学好的.

sentences.en: He's not bad for a beginner.
sentences.cn: 就新手而论,他已经很不错了.

sentences.en: I am not a beginner in politics in Philadelphia.
sentences.cn: 我对费拉德尔斐亚市的政治并不是一无所知的人.

sentences.en: My instructor thought that the beginner's class was too easy for me.
sentences.cn: 老师认为初级课程对我来说太容易了.

sentences.en: Naturally, as a beginner I'm not a very good driver yet.
sentences.cn: 我初学开车, 当然开不好了.

sentences.en: She plays well enough for a beginner.
sentences.cn: 对于初学者来说,她弹奏得已相当不错了.

sentences.en: She was taking quick puffs at her cigarette like a beginner.
sentences.cn: 她像刚开始抽烟的人一样很快地吸着。

sentences.en: The courses will give the beginner personal tuition in all types of outdoor photography.
sentences.cn: 该课程将为初学者一对一地讲授各种户外摄影技巧。

sentences.en: The young man is a raw beginner.
Think of the dialog as being in either beginner or advanced mode.
sentences.cn: 你可能认为这种对话框既适用于初学者,也适用于高级用户.

phrases.tran_cn: 新手的好运气（据信新手在做事总会碰到好运）

trans.tran_cn: 新手，初学者，创立人，鼻祖，初学者的好运气（或意外成功）
trans.tran_en: someone who has just started to do or learn something
